text: Audience was an American pay television channel. It was owned by AT&T.; It featured a mix of original and acquired series, specials, and feature films. It was originally exclusive to DirecTV, though it was also added to AT&T; U-verse after AT&T;'s 2015 acquisition of DirecTV. It was launched in 1999. The channel ceased operations on May 22, 2020. Category:American television channels Category:1999 establishments in the United States Category:2020 disestablishments in the United States
title: Audience (TV network)
